description:
Burly enough to stand up to the demands of professional use and deep snowpacks, the Stealth 300 is free of the dangling pull-cable found on other probes. In its place, there’s a tube nested into the first probe section. It makes it smaller in your pack, and quick to deploy: just pull the trigger and the probe extends to its full 300cm.

  • Laser-etched depth markings are easy to read and highly resistant to wear
  • Tip penetrates debris easily
name: Backcountry Access Backcountry Access Stealth Probe - 300cm
